channel.title: Need help with a source
channel.description:
Alright guys, im trying to find a source that would have the following: Alot of Players Good PVP Alot of donators.
But im not sure which source to use that looks actually decent.
could anybody give me some links of some sources, cause i can't find any that are dcent.

item.title: Need help with a source
item.dc:creator: @thuqs_range2 thuqs range
item.description:
@thuqs_range2 wrote:

mursanari:

Sure, you may use my source, im alredy hosting it so is all you need to do is make an account and i’ll give you owner, the ip is 127.0.0.1

Smd bro.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a source
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“thuqs range, post:1, topic:401303”]Alright guys, im trying to find a source that would have the following:
Alot of Players
Good PVP
Alot of donators.

But im not sure which source to use that looks actually decent.

could anybody give me some links of some sources, cause i can’t find any that are dcent.[/quote]

You won’t find a server source “comes” with a lot of players or donators. Those come with time and advertising.

There are some servers however that focus a lot on pvp development. I’m sure a quick look through the server downloads section would give you what you’re looking for.

Read full topic
